channel.title: Panopticon Flow - industry city sleepers [DnB]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/icsleepers/panopticon-flow
I had a lot of fun with this one. It came together pretty quick. This is the first time in a while I heard something in my head and was able to get it into an audible format almost 100%. I don't release things I'm not happy with, but I am MOST happy with this so far.
Some beats and breaks and piano. I really like how the bass came together and counters the melody. But anyway, you let me know. As always, open for feedback good and bad :raised_hands:t3:

item.title: Panopticon Flow - industry city sleepers [DnB]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I’d love to, but the thought of wrestling with 10 second long vocal samples in Auxy’s current state makes me want to cry - deeply lol. It’d be something I’d want to do in FL or preferably Reason if I still had it.

Though the last time I wrote a song with vocals I wrote the music in like two days and then spent like 12 days nudging the vocals around lmao… I don’t think it’s my strong point

Read full topic

item.title: Panopticon Flow - industry city sleepers [DnB]

item.description:
Just listening to this again.

I can’t help thinking that it could work well as a vocal version.

Thanks man

item.title: Panopticon Flow - industry city sleepers [DnB]
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.description:
Nice Liquid Funk* track!

*Liquid Funk is a sub-genre of Drun N Bass which is more about beauty. It’s the equivalent of Deep House.
DnB is about the hard work and the groove, while Liquid Funk is about the gorgeous chords and beautiful melodies, plus the groove.

Read full topic
